column1: America has led the world by embracing science not denying it. We need a president who will restore evidence and facts in our policy to fight COVID-19 climate change and so many of of our 21st century challenges. That’s why we have to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris.

The American people deserve to choose the next president and that president should choose the next Supreme Court justice. Nothing that happens this week changes that. We should be working on a COVID relief package instead of this sham partisan process.

As a school superintendent I always enjoyed the first day of class. That day looked very different this year with #COVID19.  Kids need broadband to learn—yet 65000 Colorado students don't have internet at home. That's why I'm fighting for the #BRIDGEAct. https://t.co/uRvaZZl8BJ

For months Mitch McConnell has failed to negotiate a bipartisan relief package for workers families & businesses suffering from #COVID19.    We have no more time to waste.   Let's increase state & local funding create a #HealthForce pass #RESTARTAct & expand UI benefits—now.

Proper nutrition is vital for kids to excel. During a pandemic it’s critical for strong immune systems to keep them safe.  Strengthening nutrition & fighting #COVID go hand in hand.  It's why @JoeNeguse & I have a plan to expand #SNAP & support families.  https://t.co/zW1KS5VZy7

It’s National Poll Worker Recruitment Day!  This election is the most important in our lifetime. With #COVID19 we need to make sure we have enough people—especially young people—helping it run smoothly. Sign up to be a poll worker at https://t.co/8GymEMoPTG. #HelpAmericaVote https://t.co/ILYiUNGLqw

Using themes from my book—#LandOfFlickeringLights—we dive into the tyrannical minority of the Freedom Caucus systemic racism corruption of inaction on climate Iran’s nuclear capabilities lack of investment in the wake of COVID-19 & a new definition for the American founder.

.@JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris have fought for the middle class & those who need it most their whole lives.  This isn’t just about Trump’s empty promises & lies.  It's about his record—cutting taxes for wealthy stripping away health care & mishandling COVID-19.  The choice is clear. https://t.co/WMVfPMbAkq

.@KamalaHarris has spent her career fighting for people who need it most — an essential quality for our Vice President as we face the coronavirus pandemic economic turmoil and our longstanding struggle for racial justice in America.   #BidenHarris2020

Next January our economy will still be reeling from COVID-19—a disaster @realDonaldTrump has only made worse by putting politics over science.  We need a leader who's clear-eyed about #climatechange & our clean energy economy. That leader is @JoeBiden.  https://t.co/2SJEwoGmQ8

New Podcast: Spoke with SF school board commissioner @StevonCook about education racial injustice & #COVID19 recovery — all topics at the front of mind for families across the country. Grateful for the thoughtful dialogue in these challenging times.   https://t.co/oH26LN9L39

COVID-19 created the greatest economic crisis this country has seen since the Great Depression. And the extended unemployment benefits are pumping $50 billion a week into America’s economy.   We have to take action now to #ExtendUI and #SaveThe600.

Today that battle plays out in all aspects of our lives from our response to the coronavirus pandemic to the fight for racial justice.  No good comes from hoarding freedoms and equality. And it is our job as citizens to make our country more fair more democratic and more free.

Coloradans deserve a president who will lead our country with a national strategy for COVID-19 testing—not a president who bucks responsibility ignores facts & halts funding during a pandemic.   American lives are at risk. It's time to put them above politics @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/FdhRO0G2xM

Today my thoughts are with those who gave what Abraham Lincoln called their last full measure of devotion to our country—those who embodied the best of America.  This is especially true this #MemorialDay as we face the loss of so many veterans to COVID-19.
